story: .

Do you miss those old teen humor books where they went on some crazy adventures? Then this new and exciting book is just for you.

 
Meet Riley. She can take on a bolt of lightning, end up in the wrong place at the wrong time, and finally land herself in a bizarre jungle adventure.  Welcome to The Way-Out Life of Riley, where she confronts them all in the goofiest and most heroic, Riley sort of way. 
 
 

Cover 1

 

 

 

WHO WE ARE: THE CREATORS

Jeff Shultz is well known for his incredible volume of work on Archie’s Betty and Veronica, along with others, including Peanuts, Looney Tunes and Tom and Jerry.

Rich Maurizio has been involved with an assortment of classic characters, including Tom and Jerry, Looney Tunes, Animaniacs and Underdog, as well as producing comics based on classic TV shows: The Munsters, I Dream of Jeannie and Mister Magoo’s Christmas Carol.

Both Jeff and Rich realized they wanted to develop their own creator owned projects. Jeff said “I have these ten pages of a story I did about a girl named Riley. Rich looked at the pages, thought they were great, and said ” Okay, let’s do this.”

We’ll share the writing and art. Jeff does pencils and Rich will do most of the inks.

With both being huge fans of the silver age teen humor books, we thought the best way to approach this was to write the series in that style

We wanted to take the characters on unusual adventures. We're writing our stories where the characters could be old-time detectives in one story, and in the next be something from mythology. 

We then brought on Glenn Whitmore to color the covers and stories. Glenn has contributed colors to DC’s Superman and the infamous Death of Superman series, along with Archie, Super Suckers and others for Sitcomics, and Die Kitty Die for Astro Comics. 

 

OUR CAST OF CHARACTERS

 

Riley: Normally steady and reliable, she becomes a firecracker when heated up. And with a lot of gumption, has the ability to take on any challenge. Good thing-- she'll need it.

Her best friend has the odd but distinctive name of....sorry you'll have to wait for it. We just can't give it away.But we'll say she's rockin the little Miss Sunshine 60's look. Is there something else behind the free spirited,incense burning girl ? Who knows?
 

OUR GOAL  

Our goal is to produce the series through the imprint Funny Book Institute (FBI) and then compile the first three 32 pg issues into a trade paperback with an all new story.  We believe we can  meet and surpass this realistic goal, with remaining funds put towards covering production costs and funding of the book. We'll be introducing some exciting stretch goals once we meet our initial objective. 

 We intend on launching another campaign for the Way Out Life of Riley after the first issue. We’ll keep producing Riley books and other creative titles as long as we meet our goals.

CONTRIBUTOR 

And speaking of being a  contributor, you will receive a book along with some incredible perks,  We’ll be doing limited art pieces, sketch covers, signed editions, and will offer a stunning set of Space Girl prints signed by Jeff. We are firm believers in all ages comics, and we love and believe that there can be all forms of genres in this industry.  

W

Cover recreation of a classic Dan Decarlo cover by Jeff Shultz and Rich Maurizio

Looney Tunes cover by Richard Maurizio

Wonder Woman   by Jeff Shultz

I

Black Cat by Richard Maurizio

Ways you can Help

If you can’t make a contribution, please share this campaign on social media and let people know about our venture. 

Thank you and let the fun begin!

story:
Kanshi-in (The Wardens)

This is a story of loss, courage, empathy, love, and measured revenge. The world is beautiful, vast, and diverse ecologically, and I want the world to be as much of a character as our two protagonists. Who happen to be mice. The inhabitants of the realm will be small critters!

  • I am a scrub artist. I recently took art back up for the first time in 10 years. I have been working in digital mediums for the past year
  • My goal with this project, is to complete and print my first comic (first issue)
  • I intend to begin another story after about 4 issues of Kanshi-in (each 22-30 full color pages)

The Impact

 

To get this printed in full color, and made a reality I need your help.  this project will mean a few very big things for me.

  • First and foremost this will assist me in my dream of doing art for a living.
  • The first $5000 I earn with the first issue, will go to my transition surgeries. This will be huge for me personally.
  • Any earnings beyond the initial $5000 will go to a yet undetermined charity for women and girls.

Challenges

 

This is my first comic, so I imagine the process will take longer than it will in future. I am putting myself on a short timeline for the first issue and would like to see it complete by December. This will also be my first time having a comic printed so though I intend for that to go smoothly there may be some delays with shipping.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • If you would like to simply donate, your contribution will be most appreciated. You can also donate via my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sulacoqueenart
  • If you cannot contribute financially but want to help, please consider spreading the word
story_txt:
Kanshi-in (The Wardens)
This is a story of loss, courage, empathy, love, and measured revenge. The world is beautiful, vast, and diverse ecologically, and I want the world to be as much of a character as our two protagonists. Who happen to be mice. The inhabitants of the realm will be small critters!

I am a scrub artist. I recently took art back up for the first time in 10 years. I have been working in digital mediums for the past year
My goal with this project, is to complete and print my first comic (first issue)
I intend to begin another story after about 4 issues of Kanshi-in (each 22-30 full color pages)


The Impact
 
To get this printed in full color, and made a reality I need your help.  this project will mean a few very big things for me.

First and foremost this will assist me in my dream of doing art for a living.
The first $5000 I earn with the first issue, will go to my transition surgeries. This will be huge for me personally.
Any earnings beyond the initial $5000 will go to a yet undetermined charity for women and girls.


Challenges
 
This is my first comic, so I imagine the process will take longer than it will in future. I am putting myself on a short timeline for the first issue and would like to see it complete by December. This will also be my first time having a comic printed so though I intend for that to go smoothly there may be some delays with shipping.

Other Ways You Can Help
 

If you would like to simply donate, your contribution will be most appreciated. You can also donate via my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sulacoqueenart

If you cannot contribute financially but want to help, please consider spreading the word

story:
Hello, my name is Brian Robinson.

I am the artist and creator of Phantom Buster. This my first IndieGoGo project.

What is Phantom Buster you ask?

A superhero that uses his superhuman powers to track and hunt down monsters, ghost, demons, supernatural evildoers to protect mankind. He uses the dead corpses and former monster residue of his hunts- to fund- and even create weapons to use to fight against the unholy evil beast in future battles.

I plan right now to publish the comic book via Digital PDF.

I already have ALL the pages completed.

44 pages of Written/Illustrated/Lettered - ready to go.

The plan is to release it in Black and White because I don't feel comfortable with my own coloring.

I have a few of my own display pinups in the examples above and below as you can see displayed around this page.

 

If you have questions please free to contact me.

If at any time you have a question, you can find me on twitter at @brianrobinson

 

Thanks again for taking the time to view my project.

story:
Samurai adventurers battle mythological beings in their quest to discover why the sun no longer rises.

 

Enter the Realm of Shinkoku...

 

Black Sun Samurai is set in mythological feudal Japan, a land called Shinkoku. It is a world where honourable samurai live side by side with tengu, oni, kappa and other beings from Japanese legend. It is deeply inspired by Japanese history and legends.

Cover A by Calvin Seraphinus

This book is unlike any samurai comic you've ever read. Each carefully crafted page is a work of art in itself, beautifully painted by concept artist and illustrator Calvin Seraphinus in his expressive style with hand lettered SFX by Lucas Gattoni.

 

Black Sun #1 Synopsis:

Kabukimono bandits, as flamboyant as they are violent, embark on a daring raid of the Shogun's caravan. Their ruthless leader, Toramiyo, is certain their bold attack will yield abundant gold and treasure. But Toramiyo doesn't just want gold, he wants fame and glory and he is the type of man who takes what he wants – with steel.

 

 

However, the wild bandits weren't counting on our two heroes being part of the convoy. An old tengu samurai, Arashi Kumtaka, well past his prime but a master of the katana and a low ranking but honourable human – Kegare Hakajima.

 

 

These two samurai heroes defend one particular overturned carriage with the fury of wounded dragons. Why this carriage?

Despite valiant efforts, Kegare and Arashi are beaten back, and the bandits pounce on the overturned carriage. Flinging the door open, something unexpected tumbles out onto the dusty ground…


 

Whoever she is, she has spirit! But Toramiyo has killed women before and he won't hesitate to kill one who dares draw HIS blood.

 


 

That is, until he see's she has the dragon eyes of a Yataiyo! Why was a Yataiyo being transported in the Shogun's caravan? The Yataiyo are the old Imperial line. They haven't ruled Shinkoku for centuries.

 


 

The Shogun's troops have rallied from the initial shock of the surprise attack and now slaughter the Kabukimono like chickens. The bandits lose their courage and begin to flee even before Gumiko, a nezume (rat-girl) thief, signals the retreat.


Against his better judgment, Toramiyo kidnaps the beautiful Yataiyo princess. She wasn't the treasure he was expecting, but perhaps she will be worth much more.

 

The Shogun is outraged, and tasks Kegare and Arashi with rescuing the kidnapped princess.  This will set off a series of calamities that lead to the terrible Black Sun....


 

Variant Covers

Variant "B" by J.C. Grande

Kabukimono Attack

Variant Cover "C" by Pema Mendez 

Gumiko vs Kegare

Characters

Series Synopsis

The series will be 6 issues, 34 pages in each issue plus supplementary material.

The series is based on the famous Shinto legend about sun-goddess Amaterasu who hid in a cave after being insulted by Susanoo, the god of the sea. In darkness, civil war raged between competing human clans and mythological beings while the crops fail and the peasants starved.

In the Black Sun series, a samurai warrior, a Shinto exorcist, a noble archer and a timid geisha with astonishing powers are brought together over the death of their Shogun to discover the secret of the perpetual night. Black Sun #1 sets the stage for this epic adventure.

Worldbuilding

The idea for Black Sun originally came to me while riding the Shinkansen from Osaka to Tokyo. Since then we've spent more than a year not just writing the story but creating the entire world of Shinkoku. As the adventure progresses our heroes will explorer this strange mystical land and discover many races and species that inhabit the island. 




Creatures of Shinkoku
 

Creative Team

 

Grab the Promo Poster Add-On Perk

Series Promo Poster by Jason Ngo

11 x 17 Cardstock- 80# Cover Gloss (216 gsm)

The series promo poster by Jason Ngo is available as an add-on perk at checkout. It depicts the battle with the Naga Queen from later in the Black Sun series.

Four posters are available as add on's at checkout. Get the whole set!

 

We gave a sneak peak of the script to samurai actor Keita Arai to ensure we fully captured the authentic spirit of the samurai. 


 

Black Sun was named Indie Volt's "book of the week"! 

http://indievolt.com/2021/04/07/indie-volts-boo...

We Support Indiecron.com

Indiecron.com is the best way for indie comic fans to stay up to date on all the comicbook campaigns on Kickstarter and Indiegogo. We really are in a golden age of indie comics. There is such a huge variety of creators producing exciting books unlike ever before. 

To show our support and to help keep Indiecron going strong, we will be donating $1 for every backer who pledges, even if we do not achieve our goal!

Additionally, If we reach our goal, Indiecron will be raffling off a free t-shirt to one of our lucky backers!

Risks & Challenges

We've put a lot of blood, sweat and tears into bringing the project this far. If we are so lucky as to have a successful campaign, we will take great pride in fulfilling every single aspect of it. This is our big chance in our burgeoning careers and we are not going to blow it. By hook or by crook, whatever challenges we face, we will find a way to overcome them and deliver top quality material to everyone who was generous enough to support us.

If we do not reach our goal, unfortunately we will not be able to publish the book. All the funds pledged will be returned by Indiegogo to the backers. We are relying on all you generous backers to help us get this project off the ground and make our dream a reality.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support the book monetarily, but you can help us tremendously just by spreading the word about this project on twitter, facebook, reddit and other social media. 

Can you spot a typo/spelling mistake in my campaign? I'll send you a free digital copy of the book if you're the first to point it out! Let me know about it in the comments. 

Want to help promote Black Sun? Here are some memes and quotes you can post on your social media to help us find backers and get this project funded!

 

 

 

 

To all our backers, THANK YOU for supporting us and helping make this project a reality. We can't do it without you!

If you have a question feel free to ask on the comments section of this page!

Our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/BlackSunSamurai

story:
The Story behind Beast King...

Genetically modified from birth, Jake Stephens must find his own path as he gains more control over his abilities. The company behind his mutation, Anico, murdered his parents and is now hunting Jake down for their own experiments. He is the perfect specimen of what Anico wanted to create, a genetically modified soldier. 

 

But Jake wants revenge for his parents murder, and he is not letting anything get in his way. After a massive betrayal from the one person he thought he could trust, Jake is now on his own and must destroy Anico for good. Can he pull this off without losing himself to the beast within? 

Here is a free digital copy of Beast King Issue #1 to give you an idea of the awesomeness you will be reading.

Digital Copy of Beast King Issue #1 PDF Download

 But who is this for?

Do you enjoy stories with a flawed main character with a no nonsense attitude like that of Wolverine, but is plagued by a monstrous transformation like that of The Hulk? 

Do you like the idea of stories combining elements of science fiction and fantasy to create unique stories?

Do you enjoy strong characters, action-packed fights, and a plot-line that you will get sucked in to? 

Then Beast King is the must-read comic series for you! Every issue is filled with 32 pages of story content for your enjoyment.

And Finally, Thank You!

Without the help of comic book fans and even people new to comics, stuff like this wouldn't be possible. We creators more than anything just want to produce great stories for individuals like you to be able to just enjoy and have fun reading. To be able to maybe help people momentarily forget about the troubles in the world is truly a great feeling.

So I just want to say THANK YOU for putting your faith and trust in me as a creator and allowing me to put my work in the world for more people to see. Without your help, none of this would be possible.

story:
Short Summary

Loopycomics is an online project company that creates systems that entertainingly fuse educational values. Loopycomics is a subsidiary of Hoshistech Corp USA.

What We Need & What You Get

We intend to develop:

The biggest online edutainment platform.

  • We will start from comics series to learning games and educational cartoons.
  • We are building a multi-web platform in multiple languages.
  • We tend to give full access to everybody that supports our fundraising campaign.

The Impact

Loopy Comics plans to use their comics as a tool to inform and inspire kids in an interactive and fun way. The webcomics series are intended to improve readers’ cultural, historical, social, and economic knowledge as well as foster interaction through the stories.:

Risks & Challenges

Social problems affecting countries, such as poverty alleviation, child abuse, and labor, war and conflict, human rights, gender equality, and climate change.

These issues can be solved, and we tend to inform, inspire, and motivate people to act. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We will like to launch loopycomics in multi countries.

* Support from organizations or individuals will be helpful to launch in other countries.

* Support from designers and creative writers will be helpful.

http://Loopycomics.com

story:
Welcome to the World of 2688. Welcome to the world of The Strange!

  This special wraparound cover was penciled by Rafael Lanhellas (Dynamite), inker Belardino Brabo (DC Comics) and colors Ivan Nunes (DC Comics).

The Strange Trade Paperback is a 132 pages of story, artwork and more! Printed on premium glossy paper with a stock cover.

THE STRANGE is a fast moving, action packed, sci-fi superhero adventure comic about a young man named Beko who has uncontrolled genetic power that causes terrible explosions. Hunted by the Fuller Epsilon Group, a multi-national conglomerate that owns proprietary genetics with a steel hand, he must also master his own powers. Forced into the desert-like Sea Beds, he is rescued by Fresh, an ex-military soldier in exile. After several years of peace, it all fades after his surrogate father is killed. For some time Beko evades detection, but is eventually captured and taken back to New Paris. There, facing Reconstruction, where your body is dissolved and extract the artificial DNA, he is rescued by a group called The Occupation. Now, free at last Beko hopes to discover the secrets of his powers as well as his past.

The premise of The Strange is a future world that is embraced in an Ice Age. To evolve, man found he must evolve too. So began the slow change that combined the science of genetics and robotics, or Transhumanism. This movement embraced the concept of humans slowly becoming machines, or The Posthuman. Not everyone embraced, or could afford, this new way of life. The human is a Sub Human now, or normal; the Transhuman is the advanced life form. They call it the New Evolution.

But there are those that fight against this New Evolution, and throughout the years, many organization rose and fell. Over time only one survived - The Occupation. Their leader, Orphan, is a science pirate and sometimes ambiguous transhuman. Despite his wish to help transhumans, his own work seems to contradict this fact. Still, he is followed from his sewer lair, the Catacombs, by the Unwanted and his elite team of transhuman fighters: Commander Caraway, Scarborough and O' Conner.

Here in the beginning of Issue #1 we see Beko running from a Cannibal Gang, a group of killers that hunt for flesh in the wasteland of the Sea Beds of what was once France.


 


 

By the way, my name is John Daniel Taylor IV and I am the owner and Editor in Chief of Top Secret Press. For the last seven years, I have been creating and writing comics with the help of the best talented artists that I can find. My Assistant Editor/Wife, Francesca Henle-Taylor, also helps me to run the business end of TSP as well as social media and more. As Top Secret Press, we have published books all over the world, as well as worked with artists all over the globe. In other words, we live to make comic books!

This is my first IndieGoGo, so I thought I would start off with the book that helped me get it all going - The Strange. This isn't the first comic book I created, but it was the one that gained a lot of attention for TSP and myself. The series features a diversity of characters much like the X-Men in, in a futuristic science fiction setting.

 Issue #2, The Occupation must hurry to rescue Beko from the Reconstruction Chamber. Here, Lady White uses her cybernetic powers to disarm the alarm system. Then, Orphan gives the order which Commander Caraway passes onto his teammates Scarborough and O'Conner.

There are a lot of Add Ons. Fourteen at this point! We have a variety of cool items, including a deck of The Strange Playing Cards! Is there something you think we should add? Just let me know and I will do my best to get it set up for you!

Some of these items have limited production runs!


This Trade Paperback reprints issue #1, #2, #3 of The Strange, and the 14 page story in The Strange Sourcebook #1. It features all the covers in their original form as well as later without logo art. The book also has an artwork section with artwork created during the series. There is a small section about The World of the Strange and even a map (See below!)!

The art team for the story arc were great to work with! Francisco Menor did the pencils (all issues), Juan Albarran (Inks #1), Robert Doan (Inks #2 & #3), and Jay Moyano (Colors all issues).

I have a solid track record of project delivery elsewhere on the internet, so I feel I can confidently say you will receive this book in a quick and timely manner. My hope is to reach out to new fans! Not only of The Strange, but of Top Secret Press as well!

If there is anything you need, or have any questions, you can contact me here, or any of the various social media sites below.

Okay! It's all up to you guys now ~ Thanks!

John Daniel Taylor IV
Editor in Chief / Owner
Top Secret Press

ETSY SHOP: www.etsy.com/shop/TopSecretPress
WEB SITE: www.topsecretpress.com
FACEBOOK: www.facebook.com/topsecretpress
TWITTER: www.twitter.com/topsecretpress1 
INSTAGRAM: www.instagram.com/topsecretpress​​
TUMBLR: http://topsecretpress.tumblr.com

Looking for more information?

There is a small section about The World of the Strange and even a map (See below!)!The art team for the story arc were great to work with! Francisco Menor did the pencils (all issues), Juan Albarran (Inks #1), Robert Doan (Inks #2 & #3), and Jay Moyano (Colors all issues).I have a solid track record of project delivery elsewhere on the internet, so I feel I can confidently say you will receive this book in a quick and timely manner. My hope is to reach out to new fans! Not only of The Strange, but of Top Secret Press as well!If there is anything you need, or have any questions, you can contact me here, or any of the various social media sites below.Okay! It's all up to you guys now ~ Thanks!John Daniel Taylor IVEditor in Chief / OwnerTop Secret PressETSY SHOP: www.etsy.com/shop/TopSecretPressWEB SITE: www.topsecretpress.comFACEBOOK: www.facebook.com/topsecretpressTWITTER: www.twitter.com/topsecretpress1 INSTAGRAM: www.instagram.com/topsecretpress​​TUMBLR: http://topsecretpress.tumblr.comLooking for more information?

story:
IDEA 

Wow effect has long been an integral part of cinema, advertising and animation. Computer graphics absorbed everything. With the development of technology, Wow effect quickly penetrates into everyday life. Augmented and virtual reality in phones and tablets becomes an integral part of ourselves. We are interested in everything new and exciting, but in the motley of this whole tinsel mankind forgets about the origins.

It is no longer interesting to just read, there is no familiar "WOW", which falls on us from the monitor screens. Children seldom hold ordinary books in their hands - it's boring.

Among all this domination of various know-how it seems really boring.

We are in no way against new technologies, let alone trying to forget the old. We try to synthesize.

We are the youth literary magazine INDIGO, which has absorbed the best of modern technologies and has been reborn in a new paper-digital format.

We offer a literary magazine with augmented reality, which embodied the best of quality youth literature, fine art in the format of comics and computer graphics as an augmented reality.

This is such a crazy mix.

 
How IT works!

For Android 4.1 or higher.

  1. Scan QR code from our website`s main page http://comicsar.net/ 
  2. Download and install app on your smart device from GOOGLE PLAY.
  3. Hold your smart device in front of the same picture our website`s main page or image bottom.
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lastleaf.indigo
 
Coming soon for IOS.
 
This is demo version. This app will work with paper graphic novels book.
 
 

DIFFICULTIES

The youth literary magazine INDIGO was founded in 2012 in Luhansk (Ukraine) and was only a paper edition.

INDIGO Magazine was a social project aimed at developing and supporting aspiring authors in the field of literature and cinematography.

For its short existence, four issues were published, and in the future, according to the stories of the magazine, five short films were made, which became prizewinners at many international festivals.

But in the East of Ukraine the war began and crossed out all the chances for the existence of this project.

 

CHANGES

We tried to revive the project again, but our first crowdfunding campaign on the territory of Ukraine failed. We began to analyze our failure and realized that we needed to radically change the vector of development and follow the new trends.

So our literary paper magazine INDIGO was reborn and received a paper-digital format, embodying the latest technologies of augmented reality.

Now we have the same Wow effect. Our magazine with the help of a phone or tablet turns into a "living" story-teller - it becomes a symbiosis of audiobook, animation and game.

Each story we try to turn into a work of art, carefully exploring the characters, environment and scenarios of the character's interaction with the reader, involving the latter in a unique adventure.

We hire professional actors to animate our computer characters. We turn our story into unforgettable experience, giving the reader magnificent stories.

We honor the classic literary traditions of the best genre masters such as Stephen King, Howard Lovecraft, Philip K. Dick, Jules Verne and many others and demand the same level from our young writers.

STAGE

At this stage, we continue to collect material for the updated issue of the magazine. We are expanding, and our editorial staff accepts stories in English, Russian and Ukrainian. Our artists are fruitfully working on illustrations of the stories included in the new issue. Animators are working on characters.

While we are a small studio and in our team there are only a few painters, animators, computer graphics designers and editors. But we are very rapidly developing and growing.

We need powerful computers. Rendering high-quality graphics takes up all the resources of our machines, and server farm services are not that cheap. In addition, we need money to print the magazine.

We believe that our project will revolutionize the entertainment industry. This is a prominent, youth project, which will return love to literature at its best.

Acquiring our PERKS or BACK IT project you help this project to be implemented!

story:
What is Stellar Odyssey? This is a scifi fantasy comic book series co-created by Ray Marek III & Jay Sloan. It is our love letter to the scifi fantasy genre and two passion projects that came together to form one gigantic universe full of all types of characters. Ray's project started as a script for a Star Wars story he submitted to Dark Horse Comics, back when they still held the rights to publish SW comics. Actually they were in the midst of the rights going back to Marvel so they had to pass. This led to Ray removing all things related to the force, the Jedi & the Sith and changing it over to original characters. His ideas became "The Knights of Belaterra." Jay's project, Vagabond Blues, while also heavily inspired by Star Wars actually draws more inspiration and parallels from Cowboy Bebop. We combined both of our projects under one umbrella which is Stellar Odyssey.

 

While we still are working on releasing both The Knights of Belaterra AND Vagabond Blues, those are more self contained stories and have a certain beginning and ending. In the main title series of this universe we will be spotlighting certain characters or groups of characters that will shine in their own story arcs and one shots. This gives us and readers a chance to explore our characters and universe beyond the pages of the other two books. Issue one is a sampler of short stories while issues two thru five will be a four issue story arc featuring Atilla Banks & his crew of smugglers.

If you're new to Stellar Odyssey this campaign offers the opportunity to get all 3 issues that have already been published and get yourself caught up while we work on issues 4 & 5. Issue one features two stories from some talented indie comic creators. The first story is 12 pages written by Ray Marek III and illustrated by Jay Sloan and Dino Agor. Then there is a six page story written by Brian Hawkins and illustrated by Flavio Rodrigues that serves as a prelude to the next four issues. The first story introduces characters that will be the main focus of the "Knights of Belaterra" and "Vagabond Blues" series. The second story features a group of smugglers on the run from bounty hunters as they try to deliver an illegal package to a mystery client.

 

This cover variant is available exclusively through Indiegogo!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Welcome to the Stellar Odyssey universe! Issue one is somewhat of a sampler issue. First we're introduced to Jacy Legend and Macen Delak as they prepare for two separate missions. Jacy and his crew are colonizers for the Belaterra regime and are about to set out to establish a new colony on a planet recently claimed by government officials on Belaterra. While Macen and his partner Rhyne Rozerg are both Knights of Belaterra, a well trained order of knights that enforce the laws of Belaterra, and they set out to aid a village of citizens that have been under attack from amphibious alien creatures. Then the final act of issue one sets up a story arc that spotlights infamous smuggler Atilla Banks and his crew as they try to escape a group of bounty hunters that have all come to collect the price on their heads.

 

 

On the run after stealing a rare plant that heals maladies, Atilla Banks and his crew are desperately trying to keep the "herb of Marmuke" safe until they can meet up with their mystery client while also being tracked by bounty hunters. A crash landing on a planet completely off course from their destined rendezvous point causes an unexpected wrinkle in Atilla's plan. The bounty hunters follow but Atilla Banks and his team find themselves in more trouble with the planet’s natives.

 

Stellar Odyssey issue 3 picks up right where issue 2 left off, Atilla's crew is stranded on the planet Etherien with the bounty hunters Gravelocke, Tasia Ketuu, Grimm Rukkus and Onix Orion hot on their trail. While trying to find a ship to steal so they can get off planet and back on route to their client, they get roadblocked by a Knight of Belaterra. And not just any Knight of Belaterra, Shea Orris knows all about Atilla and his crew. Shea is unwilling to let them pass, he's intent on bringing the criminal smugglers to justice. It's a showdown between the swordsman and the gunslinger and the bounty hunters want in on the action too!

 

Each issue of Stellar Odyssey is a 24 page full color standard sized comic book. All the comic books are already printed and in stock as well as are all of the other rewards. T-shirts are printed and shipped directly to you by Teespring. As soon as your payment goes through we can immediately begin processing your rewards for packaging and shipping.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a pledge to this project but you believe in our efforts and would still like to contribute in some fashion then sharing the link on social media and telling friends you think would be interested in Stellar Odyssey would help tremendously! Helping to spread awareness about our campaign is always appreciated.

story:
The Book

Starship Delta is a series that I've been writing about 2 years, and have been scripting for 8 months. With a collaborating artist, and new team member the comic book is beginning to come to fruition. This story follows the events caused by a mysterious starship and its involvement with a crew that finds itself thrown together through a whirlwind of circumstances. Starting on the ominous and dark "Cosmic Colosseum," we watch as each member of the crew begins hatching a plan for escape. 

Character pages: https://robdoo2016.wixsite.com/thelegacycomics/characters

 

 

  

The Team

The Legacy Comics is a small start-up based out of Texas who want to bring you solid stories with interesting characters. We are extremely excited that people were receptive to Earl Whett's cover page for Starship Delta, so we wanted to go ahead and move forward. Here is where you will be able to purchase the first copy of Starship Delta, available at the beginning of next year. 

Joshua Dooley: Writer; Letterer

Which is me. I'm usually the voice behind all of the social media posts, Patreon page, email updates and most importantly the scripts. I've been writing for several years trying to hone in on the ability to write compelling stories that still complete in a satisfying way, quickly. As a comic book fan I've always looked for books that weren't "pacing for the trade." Something I could pick up, read, and put away without having to buy four different tie-ins, or the next 12 issues to get the "thrilling conclusion." 

Getting a feeling for the serialized format of comic books was the greatest challenge for me, as a writer you want to give the reader everything they can to understand your world and the story. Instead, leaving things open to interpretation tends to move the story along more quickly and is more entertaining for the reader.  

After dozens of revisions I am pleased with the flow of the story and the depth of the characters, so I would like to present to you... Starship Delta!

Earl Whetts: Pencils, Inks, & Colors

The amazing artist I met while working on the script for Starship Delta that blew me away with his ability to make my ideas come to life on a page; In many cases expanding on the images that I try to convey through words.

He has been working on his own as a commissioned artist on Instagram, and his art there drew my attention. I asked him to join the team and before I could explain the entire breadth of the project he was on board. He has worked tirelessly since we decided to join forces and in the past few months he's been able to produce several promotional pieces and a dozen pages of the first issue. You can see a few of those pages above. Everything is done with physical medium, even the coloring is done with Arteza Water Color Markers which I felt gave the pages a different form of life that was very authentic and classic. 

Together we plan to produce several issues in the first arc to establish the world and the characters. The plot has been planned out to an endpoint, but ideally we want to write the story in a way that you can pick it up at any point along the way and still have a good time reading the books. 

Where your money goes

Printing and Shipping. That's it. So when you pledge you will receive either a digital copy, or a physical copy on the day of release shipped to you. We don't intend to make a profit on this first book and we really only want people to read our story. Hopefully in doing this, people will enjoy the series enough to continue reading the stories we will release bi-monthly. 

If it's just for printing and shipping, why need 5 tiers?

We also have another artist who will be willing to work on a few Variant cover's if we reach certain stretch goals. And we wanted to allow for people to have some flexibility in their involvement in funding the project. The rewards scale in terms of the quality of the book shipped and how many copies are sent. 

If you can't afford a tier

Don't worry! You can still help! If you share this page to your friends, family, or co-workers perhaps they will purchase the book! And if they do, the chances are higher we will re-print and we will be able to print for cheaper, or better yet we could come to a comic book shop near you!

Point is, don't pass us up just because you can't buy the book. Give us a follow and keep an eye out! When we blow up, our books will be much easier to acquire, and we don't want to miss out on you as a fan!

story:
"A tale that beautifully illustrates how there are some things a teacher cannot teach...instead a unique and distinct experience is the only way to learn." 

                                                                                                         --Glyn Dillon   Sandman-the kindly ones

                                                                            

The meaning of Aranya

In Sanskrit, aranya means the forest, or someplace peaceful and quiet. Truth is, as long as there are people around, no place can be aranya, even in clouds. Hi, we are Silk Road Publishing. We are devoted to bring more Chinese comics into English market. Aranya in Clouds is a terrific comic which won Prix du Public Frane of 38th Chambery BD. It has been translated into multiple languages and public in several countries.    There are two issues. #1 has 48 pages, and #2 has 32 pages. The story ends at #2. 

 

Story

Rootless was a well known monk. He was loved and worshiped by people. His temple was proud of him.  Until one day, he vanished. Two years later, he came back as a criminal. He lost his fame, freedom and people's respect. They chained him under the temple.Sick transit Florid mundi, people finally forgot him. One day, he died.At the same time, the temple began to fly away. Since then, the way people saw the temple was changed. The flying mountain drew a lot of attention,  even the emperor spoke highly of it. People started to worship the temple, just as they worshiped rootless. The town was divided: people the earth enjoyed the benefit of booming economy while monks in clouds were stepping onto the path of despair. At the end, in front of Buddha, we are all just fragile mortals. Even in Clouds, the peace can not be maintained.

Creative Team

Xiaoyu Zhang,started to create comic at 1995. Now He has made over 20 graphic novels. From 1997 to 2005, he had worked as editor of <Sci-fi World>, which is the biggest Sci-fi magazine publisher in the world. Since 2005, he began to work with Total Vision. After that, his work went all over the world. Zhang’s stories have been published by Casterman, Glénat , Ankama and Humanoid. In 2008, he wrote the story <Dough Man Masheng>. In 2013, the graphic novel <Aranya over clouds> won Prix du Public Frane of 38th Chambery BD. By working with different writers, many European graphic novels were covered by his magnificent artwork, includes: Crusades, Les chroniques de légion and L’autoroute sauvage and so on.

Zisu Feng, cover artist. big fan of drawing, traveling and art show. Favorite comic creator is Junji Itou. Top 3 movie stars are Johnny Depp, Jim Carrey and Steven Chow. Her favorite movie is <The Truman Show>. Her favorite movie director is Tim Burton. Her work includes covers and some one short comics. She created <The Legend of Blade>, AKA <Mad Blade Ksana>.

Dezi Sienty, is a freelancer designer, letterer, artist letterer. He got his working on staff at DC Comics and has going on work to do for DC, Aspen , First secod, Legendary, Valiant Comics amongst other. He has done the lettering job of Justice League and Attack on Titan. You can view his work at www.dezicnt.com and on Instagram at @dezicnt.

Culture

In this comic, you will see a Chinese city in 18 century, The way way of people living. Market, teahouse, foods. You will walk among characters. The naughty kids just escaped from school. Their old teacher is chasing them. 

 

Hear, Hear! The storyteller is narrating the stories of immortals. 

In the street, derelicts and peddlers are both trying to living another day: one is  busy living,

one is busy dying.

Here comes the king！

Long live the Emperor!

There is no one can be more great than Emperor. 

Really? What about Buddha?

Or..maybe not...

Reading story with exotic culture always cause curiosity. We get that covered. We have over 18 pages of lore to make you understand the history and culture behind the story. In this city, every job, every piece of arts are the survivor of time. 

Rewards 

Two covers of #1, rated T and Rated M.

                                                                 Issue 1 Rated T

                                                                 Issue 1 Rated M

                                                                        Issue 2 Cover

Four pin arts and their digital file:

 

 

Also, the combination of eastern and western--the inside-painting snuff bottle. 

Let me tell you something about his. Snuff was first invited by native America, and went popular in Europe. During 18 century, it came to Asian. Since then, Chinese began to manufacture snuff bottles, which create a new kind of art--Inside-painting. What is inside painting? Basically, the artist's brush comes  through the mouth of bottle, and paint inside of the bottle. Many Chinese art are painted inside the bottle. A bottle of snuff at that time was a western wild herb contained in an eastern art. The snuff bottle is a combination of east and west culture. Just like this comic. We asked an artist to paint our cover inside the snuff bottle, which is contained in a small box.     

Here is the way of making inside-painting snuff bottle. 

 

Risk and Challenges 

The comic is printing right now. We borrow some money to make sure this is delivered. We are raising fund for printing and pay for creator. 

Other Ways You Can Help 

Please help spread words. Introduce this sotry to your friends who love comics or arts.
story_txt:
"A tale that beautifully illustrates how there are some things a teacher cannot teach...instead a unique and distinct experience is the only way to learn."  
                                                                                                         --Glyn Dillon   Sandman-the kindly ones
                                                                            
The meaning of Aranya
In Sanskrit, aranya means the forest, or someplace peaceful and quiet. Truth is, as long as there are people around, no place can be aranya, even in clouds. Hi, we are Silk Road Publishing. We are devoted to bring more Chinese comics into English market. Aranya in Clouds is a terrific comic which won Prix du Public Frane of 38th Chambery BD. It has been translated into multiple languages and public in several countries.    There are two issues. #1 has 48 pages, and #2 has 32 pages. The story ends at #2. 


 

Story
Rootless was a well known monk. He was loved and worshiped by people. His temple was proud of him.  Until one day, he vanished. Two years later, he came back as a criminal. He lost his fame, freedom and people's respect. They chained him under the temple.Sick transit Florid mundi, people finally forgot him. One day, he died.At the same time, the temple began to fly away. Since then, the way people saw the temple was changed. The flying mountain drew a lot of attention,  even the emperor spoke highly of it. People started to worship the temple, just as they worshiped rootless. The town was divided: people the earth enjoyed the benefit of booming economy while monks in clouds were stepping onto the path of despair. At the end, in front of Buddha, we are all just fragile mortals. Even in Clouds, the peace can not be maintained.

Creative Team
Xiaoyu Zhang,started to create comic at 1995. Now He has made over 20 graphic novels. From 1997 to 2005, he had worked as editor of <Sci-fi World>, which is the biggest Sci-fi magazine publisher in the world. Since 2005, he began to work with Total Vision. After that, his work went all over the world. Zhang’s stories have been published by Casterman, Glénat , Ankama and Humanoid. In 2008, he wrote the story <Dough Man Masheng>. In 2013, the graphic novel <Aranya over clouds> won Prix du Public Frane of 38th Chambery BD. By working with different writers, many European graphic novels were covered by his magnificent artwork, includes: Crusades, Les chroniques de légion and L’autoroute sauvage and so on.
Zisu Feng, cover artist. big fan of drawing, traveling and art show. Favorite comic creator is Junji Itou. Top 3 movie stars are Johnny Depp, Jim Carrey and Steven Chow. Her favorite movie is <The Truman Show>. Her favorite movie director is Tim Burton. Her work includes covers and some one short comics. She created <The Legend of Blade>, AKA <Mad Blade Ksana>.
Dezi Sienty, is a freelancer designer, letterer, artist letterer. He got his working on staff at DC Comics and has going on work to do for DC, Aspen , First secod, Legendary, Valiant Comics amongst other. He has done the lettering job of Justice League and Attack on Titan. You can view his work at www.dezicnt.com and on Instagram at @dezicnt.
Culture
In this comic, you will see a Chinese city in 18 century, The way way of people living. Market, teahouse, foods. You will walk among characters. The naughty kids just escaped from school. Their old teacher is chasing them. 
 
Hear, Hear! The storyteller is narrating the stories of immortals. 


In the street, derelicts and peddlers are both trying to living another day: one is  busy living,

one is busy dying.

Here comes the king！

Long live the Emperor!

There is no one can be more great than Emperor. 
Really? What about Buddha?


Or..maybe not...

Reading story with exotic culture always cause curiosity. We get that covered. We have over 18 pages of lore to make you understand the history and culture behind the story. In this city, every job, every piece of arts are the survivor of time. 
Rewards 
Two covers of #1, rated T and Rated M.

                                                                 Issue 1 Rated T

                                                                 Issue 1 Rated M

                                                                        Issue 2 Cover
Four pin arts and their digital file:




 

 
Also, the combination of eastern and western--the inside-painting snuff bottle. 
Let me tell you something about his. Snuff was first invited by native America, and went popular in Europe. During 18 century, it came to Asian. Since then, Chinese began to manufacture snuff bottles, which create a new kind of art--Inside-painting. What is inside painting? Basically, the artist's brush comes  through the mouth of bottle, and paint inside of the bottle. Many Chinese art are painted inside the bottle. A bottle of snuff at that time was a western wild herb contained in an eastern art. The snuff bottle is a combination of east and west culture. Just like this comic. We asked an artist to paint our cover inside the snuff bottle, which is contained in a small box.     




Here is the way of making inside-painting snuff bottle. 
 
Risk and Challenges 
The comic is printing right now. We borrow some money to make sure this is delivered. We are raising fund for printing and pay for creator. 
Other Ways You Can Help 
Please help spread words. Introduce this sotry to your friends who love comics or arts.

story:
Hi! Thanks for checking out RATLINE's IndieGogo page. I know it's tough to part with hard-earned cash, so I'd like to tell you a little bit about me and this project before you make the big commitment.

 

About Ratlines

At the end of World War II, the Nazis started to get nervous the allies would discover their war crimes and they’d be punished.  Consequently, the Nazis attempted to demolish death camps, kill witnesses, burn paperwork and figure out how to escape prosecution.

With the assistance, both willful and unwitting, of groups like the Catholic Church and the International Committee of the Red Cross – AND individuals who were often highly bribable – a path from the middle of Europe down to the ports at Genoa and Rome was established. 

Consider it an Underground Railroad for really bad people.

Well, the U.S. spy masters eventually found out about this and rather than shutting it down (which they would have had a hard time doing, especially considering the power of the Catholic Church), they decided to use it for their own purposes… to get the Nazis THEY wanted to emigrate to America out of Europe without detection.  These included the scientists (Operation Paperclip) and spies (Operation Bloodstone) that we wanted to use against the coming conflict with Russia.

Our Ratline starts in Munich, cuts through Austria, crosses the Alps and goes down into Italy, concluding in Genoa – where ships wait to take people to South America and Palestine.

Interesting thing about the Ratlines – there were cases where Jewish victims of the Holocaust actually crossed paths with their Nazi persecutors while trying to immigrate to Palestine.  Crazy.

 

About my main character Hanna

Hanna is a composite of a bunch of bad-ass female spies from the World War II era including Violette Szabo, Christine Granville and Virginia Hall.  Check ‘em out on Wikipedia.  Really cool women.

Hanna's a first-generation American whose parents emigrated to the U.S. after the German economy buckled after World War I.

And though her parents – her father in particular – remain loyal to Germany and think this Hitler fellow is doing to some good things, Hanna is American through and through.

When she’s recruited by the OSS – due to the fact that she’s smart, pretty and speaks fluent German – she accepts immediately.  She’s trained at a secret camp in Canada called Camp X where she learns things like hand to hand combat and how to set explosives.

 

 

About me

 

 

I’m a writer.  Grew up in Chicago.  Have a girlfriend and a lot of cats.  Like so many cats that I wanted to give one out as a perk… but I think that violates the terms of use.  Love history, movies, novels, food, wine, my friends, family and Emily Blunt.  Not in that order.

If you didn’t notice, writer is actually a fancy hyperlink to my IMDb page :)

 

About our illustrator Mark

Here he is.  He’s Irish!  He’s handsome!  And crazy talented!  You can find his portfolio here.

 

What we need

So we have two options with this fixed-funding campaign.
  • For $15,000, we get a terrific 90-100 page graphic novel. It'll tell Hanna's full story, but won't be quite as sexy as the fully-rendered $40,000 version. The difference between roughed out and fully rendered?  Take a look at my visual samples. The roughs are awesome. The full renders are transcendent.
Rough                                               

Full render

  • For $40,000, we get a fully-rendered, 100% finished 90-100 page graphic novel.
     

What YOU get

  • At the $15,000 level, we'll have fun incentives like digital downloads and a paperback print-run. At the $40,000 level, we'll have even cooler incentives like hard cover copies, variant covers and original, signed cells and stylized maps.
  • If we don't reach the $15,000 threshold, you all get your money back! Between $15,000 and $40,000 we will create all of the additional content possible -- maybe with fully rendered sequences or higher quality printing (as funding allows).  Over $40,000, everything will go into making this the best possible graphic novel.  Over $40,000, I'm aiming at YOU, "Watchmen!"
     
Risks & Challenges
The biggest risk is not raising $15,000, because we won't have a final product. My plan is to give this campaign my all for 60 days. Then, if there isn't a market, we'll know. But I sure hope there is.
 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Maybe you don't have a spare $5 or $1500 to donate to this project. That's okay! If you think "RATLINE" is interesting and want to help, please share this link on your social networks. By amplifying the message, you are donating as well! I only know 241 people (according to Facebook) -- so if everyone who reads this then shares it with their 241 people, we might be in good shape!  

    Thanks for reading, folks. Let's make something awesome.

Between $15,000 and $40,000 we will create all of the additional content possible -- maybe with fully rendered sequences or higher quality printing (as funding allows).  Over $40,000, everything will go into making this the best possible graphic novel.  Over $40,000, I'm aiming at YOU, "Watchmen!" 

Risks & Challenges


The biggest risk is not raising $15,000, because we won't have a final product. My plan is to give this campaign my all for 60 days. Then, if there isn't a market, we'll know. But I sure hope there is.

 


Other Ways You Can Help
Maybe you don't have a spare $5 or $1500 to donate to this project. That's okay! If you think "RATLINE" is interesting and want to help, please share this link on your social networks. By amplifying the message, you are donating as well! I only know 241 people (according to Facebook) -- so if everyone who reads this then shares it with their 241 people, we might be in good shape!  
Thanks for reading, folks. Let's make something awesome.

story:
Mint Twists is 200+ page, black & white, comic anthology of short stories plucked from the weirdness of writer CodexAuctor, portrayed through the stunning and varied visual art styles of artist MintMinded.

The first 1000 copies of the PDF download are just $2 each:


So grab yours now! Read on for more details!


At around 20 pages each, every story will draw you in with an intriguing premise, quick pacing and solid action... Before ending in an unexpected twist that will have you laughing, crying or even raging at the absurdity of it all!

Bringing to life stories with diverse settings and genres, including:

Vengeance on Gods - A band of warriors seeks bloody justice for their fallen kin.
A Golden Love - A young girl clings to the promise of true love... Pure and everlasting.
Avenge War - Opposing superpowers bring incredible destructive forces to bear as they vie for control over the world and the future.
Sorceror Spelldown - Wizards, conjurers, spellcasters of all labels join forces to challenge a supremely powerful archmage.
No Zombies - In the ruins of a city, a band of hardy survivors treads carefully to avoid attracting unwanted, deadly attention.

And many more!

As an appetizer, you can read the full Vengeance on Gods story here, or download the full 26 page PDF, or scroll to the bottom of that page for concept art of other stories!

Excerpts from Vengeance on Gods:


Head to our site and read from start to end for the twist! If you like what you see, then help bring this project to launch!

PICK A PERK TIER from the right side (or scroll down if you're on a mobile device) and lock in your copy. Pay with either PayPal or just a credit card.


From as low as $2 for an early bird PDF copy (literally 1 cent per page!); or a softcover book mailed to your doorstep...

All the way to the premium Tiers where you can have your likeness included as a minor or major character:

DISCLAIMER: Matt Damon did not back a Cameo Perk, the above is just an example. He is free to retroactively fund us, however.

Or even have the anthology professionally translated to a language of your choice! Premium perks are limited in number, so get your preferred perk quickly!

There is zero risk to your pocket - if this project doesn't have enough support to hit its minimum goal of $5,000 cumulatively, you get 100% of your money back - guaranteed.

On the other hand, if we get lots of interest and the cumulative funds exceed our minimum goal, then we'll gladly add Stretch Goals such as extra stories, character design sheets - or whatever backers want to see!

STARTING STRETCH GOALS:
$5,500 = Expanded to 220 pages
$6,000 = Expanded to 240 pages
$6,500 = Expanded to 260 pages
$7,000 = Expanded to 280 pages
$7,500 = Expanded to 300 pages


All backers new and old will receive the size-upgraded book - so the more readers that end up backing our project, the more content will be included for every backer!

So fund our project and share about us with as many of your friends as possible! It's for your own benefit!

Thank you so much for all your support!


#MintTwistsComic
@Codex_Cactus
http://twitter.com/codex_cactus
www.codexcactus.wordpress.com
CodexCactus Youtube Channel
codexcactus@gmail.com

story:
Hello everybody! My name is Roman Polikarpov. I’m the author of the SpaceRamblers Graphic Novel Saga, and I’d like to tell you what it is about. It’s a comic about the 5th Squad of the Space Ramblers. The main characters are Dif the Red Dragon, Jenny the Yellow Panda, Biffley the Ape-like Penguin and Berjoe the Amphibian. Our fearsome four will have to face the greatest evil in the universe and uncover the terrible secrets of the galaxy. The heroes will visit the most frightening and mysterious corners of the universe, participate in legendary battles, meet the ancient gods and more. The Prologue will introduce you to the characters and tell you about their ambitions, and it will consist of 8 issues. The first issue consists of 28 pages.
What do we need the money for?

It’s needed for putting it in print. We need to get $1700 to do that. By purchasing the first issue by pre-ordering method you will not only get the great story in printed version, but you will also help the project to develop further! You can choose one of the 7 editions.


In addition to the printed issue, one of the editions will have a pleasant surprise – a figure of the main character of the Novel, Dif the Red Dragon. The figure is made of colored plaster on the most modern 3D printer and has a very high quality. In other editions you ‘ll find other souvenirs like a mouse pad, refrigerator magnets, stickers, exclusive poster and a disc with the exclusive OST recorded by Neotone Music Group specially for the SpaceRamblers Graphic Novel Saga.

Characteristics of the figure:
height - 150 mm,
weight - 160 grams.
Material: colored polymer plaster.

Technical characteristics of the musical compositions on the OST disc: MP3, 320 kbps, 48000 Hz, stereo.

The track list:
01. The Doomsday (02:44)
02. The World You Deserve (Instrumental) (02:51)
03. The End Of Peace (01:21)
04. The World You Deserve (Vocal) (02:56)
05. Dif's Theme Song (02:18)
06. Jenny's Theme Song (02:36)
07. Berjoe's Theme Song (02:15)
08. Biffley's Theme Song (01:54)

All perks with the printed product will be mailed to you. I will contact each one of you via e-mail. I will also ask you to be patient - I will print the Novel in another city because there are some problems with printing in my hometown. First the printed copies will come to me in my hometown, then I will personally send them to you. Those who will order the edition with the figure should be especially patient. The figure is made of colored plaster, and its production takes time. It is also manufactured in another city, and it will also be sent from there to me first. The editions will be shipped from Russia since I am Russian myself) 

Please note that shipping is included in the prices. I've added $10 to each price of the editions for international shipping costs.
All the perks will be executed only after the funding ends.

You can read some pages on the Novel's official website.

http://spaceramblers.com

There's one important thing. All the flaws that are in the available online pages were fixed specially for the printed version!



Let’s support this wondrous project!

Don't forget to join the Graphic Novel in the social networks!

https://www.facebook.com/spaceramblers

story:
When a bounty hunter shows up wounded, crawling to the doorstep of a recent widow, he will be lucky enough to be nursed back to health. The only problem is the price of treatment is a war with a ruthless gang of outlaws. 

 

Writer Richard Embree (The Last Good-Bye) and artist Mark Savona (Haunted Canada) bring you a gritty western that will be enjoyable to old and new fans of the genre. This 50 plus page graphic novel is definitely one you don't want to miss out on. 

FREE SHIPPING IN USA!!!

 

STANDARD COVER - MARK SAVONA

VARIANT COVER - CAANAN WHITE

INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE COVER - PRESTON ASEVEDO

 

 

 

 

Writer - Richard Embree

Artist - Mark Savona

Colors - Bryan Afrel Magnaye

Editor - Vince Moore 

 

 

We are very committed to deliver the highest quality of products to our supporters. All comics will be printed in the USA by Mixam. We as a team pride ourselves with providing our backers with fast and reliable customer service. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns that you might have. We hope to earn your business in the present and the future.

story:
Hello everybody! My name is Roman Polikarpov, and I’m the creator of the SpaceRamblers Graphic Novel Saga. About 3 months ago, I had the idea of an incredibly epic graphic novel featuring furry characters in a space saga. Then I gathered a team. The team is called Crazy Black,

And together we’re creating this wonderful Graphic Novel. The main storyline of the Novel will twist itself around the energy of the Universe and the 5th squad of the Space Ramblers who must find the positive stream of the Universe to stop the great evil that broke free and threatens to destroy the whole Universe.


However, the Space Ramblers aren’t the only ones who seek the positive stream. Many want to possess that power, but the most dangerous foe is a ruthless pirate, the nightmare of the galaxy, Lord Clort. There are 4 main characters in the Graphic Novel: Dif the Red Dragon, Jenny the Yellow Panda, Biffley the Ape-like Penguin and Berjoe the Amphibian. Despite the fact that there are 4 main characters in the Novel, the key character is Dif.

Our fearsome four will have to uncover many secrets mysteries, fight the most ancient and terrible creatures of the space, meet the ancient gods, participate in great space battles and more. The SpaceRamblers Graphic Novel Saga has everything! Action, parkour, blood, boobs, epic, scale, lots of mystery and secrets, everyday stuff and, of course, love! I also need to mention that the exclusive OST for the Graphic Novel is being written, and it will be available on our YouTube channel.

For now we need funding for the first issue of the Prologue. There will be 8 issues in the Prologue called ‘The Doomsday’. The number of pages in the issues is not fixed. The first issue will include 28 pages. The graphics quality in the Novel is very high, just like in the cover! We ask for a minimum amount of $1500. It’s the minimum amount we need to release the first issue pf the Prologue. It would be best if we’d collect $5000 because lots and lots of work is done. We hope you’ll appreciate our efforts!
If we collect $5000, there would be a little section called ‘The Chibi Story’ at the end of each issue!
The most generous pledgers will get a pleasant surprise: a figure of the main character of the Graphic Novel.You can read the first 5 pages of the Novel on our website. The rest of the pages will be published there.  http://spaceramblers.com/
Thank you for your support, and have a nice day!)

http://www.spaceramblers.com/
http://www.furaffinity.net/user/spaceramblers/
https://www.weasyl.com/~spaceramblers
http://polikarpovroman.deviantart.com/
https://www.facebook.com/spaceramblers
https://twitter.com/SpaceRamblers
https://www.tumblr.com/blog/spaceramblers

story:
Welcome to Indigo Valley!

While it seems to be just a normal city tucked away in the Pacific Northwest, Indigo valley is filled with strange occurrences and dark secrets. While people go about their day to day lives oblivious to anything out of the ordinary, shady figures are making plays for power under their noses. It's a side of life that has gone hidden in Indigo Valley for a long time, but it's about to burst into the public spotlight. 

At the center of this is a young man named Axel DeVeyra. Having suffered from headaches all his life, he begins to realize that he has incredible psychic abilities that make him one of the most powerful people on earth. Unfortunately for him, his talents don't remain a secret for long, and he soon becomes the target of the most dangerous men in Indigo Valley. Desiring to help people he decides to become a superhero, taking the name of Zener. Unfortunately, it may just be that the most difficult person for him to save is himself.  

What you'll be getting

This campaign will cover issues 1, 2, and 3 of Zener, covering his backstory and why he first dons the costume. It will introduce the characters, establish key aspects of the world, and best of all will feature some incredible action! 

Read Issue 0 For Free! 

Why invest in Zener when there are so many Indie books out there? Because you know exactly what you're getting! Read issue 0 of Zener right here, right now, for free! 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1e1ueWVUm3nZS...

See a Sneak Preview of issue 1!

Check out these pages that you'll be receiving in the first issue!

What Is NRG Comics?

Here at NRG comics we are creating a host of new superhero stories that combine a back-to-basics approach to heroism with creative worldbuilding and fresh, memorable characters. Our stories are mature enough not to be campy, but never take themselves too seriously to forget the essential element of fun. Zener is one of the first characters we are going to be introducing, and we hope you'll be as excited to read about him as we are to present him to you!

 

Alternate Cover

One of our awesome perks includes an alternate cover to Zener Vol. 1, featuring the main antagonist of the plot- Nocturne, a former corrupt orderly of the mental asylum where zener is kept, who turns into a maniacal, patchwork killer with the ability to manipulate shadows and feed off of the inner darkness of others!

story:
Bonum Malus

Hi, my name's Warren Hales. Ever since i was a kid i've always read comics. I used to get the beano delivered every morning before school. As i got older i never stopped reading comics but the characters changed. Now it was Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman and i've always wanted to bring a charecter to life, just like these. My story focuses on Bonum Malus (Bo-Ma). Half angel, Half demon (perfectly down the middle) he is Gods personal hitman. He does the jobs God can't. If a demon is over stepping his bounderies or being more trouble than usual, God sends Bo-Ma. When a person of great importance is abducted from heaven using the travelycio amulet, an amulet that had been hidden for many centuries, Bo-Ma is sent to retrieve the amulet and remove whom ever was responsible. This tale leads Bo-Ma on roads of twist, turns, truth and lies. A horror/comedy with plenty of removed hearts.

I would love for you to join me in bringing this charecter to life in a epic adventure i think (if your into horror, superheroes, antiheroes with a bit of blood splatter) you're really going to enjoy this.

A few hurdles i will have to over are time and equipment. I have a full time job so i can only do my passion in the evenings and weekends. Its not always possible to do this but im a hard worker and every second i do get will be spent on this. Also tools. I am limited at the moment as to everything i need which is where funding will help. It will help with the overall production of the graphic novel, be it physical or digital release. I hope we can do both.

Thank you for taking the time to read this and i hope to bring you this story very soon. Check in the updates to see the novels progression.

story:
Hello Everyone, 

I am just a simpleton who can't stop wondering why and how Donald Trump became a real life cartoon.  So I decided to start a comic book that is a 100% real biography of the smartest and most handsomest man in the universe.  We follow this hero through his shenanigans and adventures he has gotten himself into.  In this universe he is a misunderstood super hero who just wants to make the world a better place.  His arch nemesis the Democrats won't stop harassing him and they won't invite him to any cool parties.  I grew up with marvel comics and this X-Men inspired universe has all the usual suspects. This project consists of 6 one page shorts with covers, taking you through Trump's daily adventures.   I wish I could take more credit for this content but this guy writes most of it for me.    Preview FARCE OF THE DEAL and IS THERE A DOCTOR INT HE HOUSE?  If you are a little damaged like me you just might get a chuckle out of it.  I am currently writing volume 2 so please help me get this universe off the ground.  This is my first comic book so please be gentle.

Disclaimer: No cartoon illustrations were hurt during production.

The funds will be used to pay my illustrator and get the material printed.  In addition the funds will help with getting volume 2 produced.

 

 

Perk 1: $5 You will get a digital copy 

Perk 2: $10 You will get a physical copy

Perk 3: $25 You will get a digital, physical, and a 12x18 poster of the front cover

 

FRONT COVER

 

 

 

1. FARCE OF THE DEAL

2. IS THERE A DOCTOR IN THE HOUSE

3. MY IQ BRINGS ALL THE BOYS TOT HE YARD

4. UKRAINE MEKRAINE

5. THE ORIGIN STORY

6. I CAN'T BELIEVE IT'S NOT IRAN
